column5: Bookings available from Aug 19th. You are booking a modern private room in a two story house. Located near major highways, restaurants, grocery stores, Texas star golf course, parks, AT&T stadium, and just 10 min to DFW airport. My space is in between Dallas and Fort Worth. Hence, great for interns, travel workers, students (15 min to UT Arlington), business travelers, and even for adventurers. Short-term and Long-term discounts.
column8: (B) Private Room Gated Community Near DFW Airport
